summary: An adolescent girl and her toddler brother, find a star that has actually fallen to earth, that turns out to be living being...complete with cosmic powers
cast: Céline Vogt|Sandro Iannotta|Maximilian Artajo|Brit Gülland|Heinrich Schafmeister|Mirco Nontschew|Martin Reinl|Eva Mattes|Peter Fitz|Mogens von Gadow|Hildegard Krekel|Adrian Wilms|Carolin von der Groeben|Adrian Killian|Tobias Klausmann|Clemmie Hooton|Anthony Da Silva|Matthew Thomas Davies|Rebecca Vere|Nick Saich|Rosa Alessi|Charlie Brown|Joshua Capstick|Beth McCord|David Perkins
director: Directors: Piet De Rycker, Thilo Rothkirch
title: La estrella de Laura
